title: december 26: happy kwanzaa
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the founding of Kwanzaa and what celebrating Kwanzaa entails. She also revisits a recent release. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
